entry.title: Removing LAMP
entry.content:
To remove the LAMP stack you may try the following commands.
ruby Remove LAMP $ sudo apt-get purge libapache2-mod-auth-mysql phpmyadmin $ sudo apt-get purge mysql-server mysql-server-5.1 mysql-server-core-5.1 $ sudo apt-get purge apache2 apache2-mpm-prefork apache2-utils apache2.2-bin apache2.2-common libapache2-mod-php5 $ sudo apt-get autoremove

entry.title: Installing Adobe Reader on Linux
entry.content:
For installing Adobe Reader on Linux OS try the folowing commands.
ruby Install Adobe Reader $ sudo add-apt-repository "deb http://archive.canonical.com/ precise partner" $ sudo add-apt-repository "deb http://archive.canonical.com/ precise partner" $ sudo apt-get install acroread
